name: Let's Take a Selfie, Eh?
description: You play as Jimmy, the influencer. You risk your life and more importantly, your reputation to achieve the perfect livestream to gain the approval of thousands of internet strangers. You ascend the heights of the bustling and lively Vancouver to accomplish your internet fame. Will this Icarus "fly" to heights no person has gone before? Or will he fly too close to the sun and descend to the depths of internet infamy?
